articles.author: Matt Christy
articles.title: Texas man drove to Indianapolis after sending Caitlin Clark violent messages on X, court docs reveal - FOX 59 Indianapolis
articles.description: INDIANAPOLIS — A Texas man sent sexually violent messages from his X account to Indiana Fever star Caitlin Clark and then drove to Indianapolis, court documents reveal. “Been driving around your house 3x a day,” he messaged her. “But don’t call the law just y…
articles.content:
